content: sheaf the sheafband is an easy-to-make headband inspired by wheat spikes with a tie closure for a customizable fit it can be made thicker or thinner by adjusting the band number of columns half_double_crochet chain chain ps puff page 2 inspiration the wheat spike the wheat ear or wheat spike is one of nature s most quietly iconic shapes with its slender stem and neatly layered grains it s a symbol of life nourishment and continuity each tiny grain holds potential gathered together in a form that s both delicate and strong for thousands of years people have looked to the wheat ear as a sign of abundance and harvest in ancient cultures from mesopotamia to greece it stood for fertility patience and the rewards of hard work it s been carved into stone worn as a motif and honored in rituals marking the cycle of seasons what makes it so beautiful is its natural symmetry the overlapping grains create a rhythm that feels ordered and calming almost like a pattern made by hand it s a humble form but full of meaning quietly elegant deeply rooted and universally understood page 3 how to make a puff yarn over insert your hook into the designated stitch or space then yarn over again
